blocks.topicVi: Dạng so sánh hơn của trạng từ

specialRules: Adverbs ending in -ly that have same form as adjective (early): add -er → earlier
Adverbs ending in -ly that differ from adjective: add more (happily → more happily)

usage.sentence: The red car runs faster than the black car.

usage.sentence: She sings more beautifully than her sister.
usage.sentenceVi: Cô ấy hát hay hơn chị gái.

questions.correctAnswer: The red car can run faster than the black car.
Nick can jump higher than Tom.
Mai did better on the exam than Hoa.
The workers arrived earlier than my dad expected.
The buses run more frequently than the trains.
